title: 1.12.2cat服务端op一进服务器就会卡
author: 猜不透的伪装
txt_content: OP进服可能会卡在加载地形界面 服务器就会卡住 有的时候还会崩服

replies.author: HYFan_Meng
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 HYFan_Meng 于 2020-4-26 21:46 编辑 

上传logs文件以及插件列表方便我们排查如果有crash文件把crash文件也上传
是不是错删了地图文件，而人物还在被删除的存档地图里？

replies.author: 八婆
replies.txt_content: 查看插件或者mods是否提示自动更新，有的话就是这个卡登陆。把他关掉就行了

replies.author: 猜不透的伪装
replies.txt_content:
HYFan_Meng 发表于 2020-4-26 21:44
上传logs文件以及插件列表方便我们排查如果有crash文件把crash文件也上传
#CommandsItem, AutosmeltFix, ColorMOTD-Reremake, CrowdLocator, MyItems_V4.9, PlaceholderAPI-2.10.5, ProtocolLib, [COI查询]CoreProtect_2.12.0, [TPR随机传送]RandomPlacer汉化版, [tab显示]Tablist, [优化]NeverLag-1.3.0, [保护]CoreProtect-2.14.4, [修复]AntiPayloadHax, [公告]RichAutoMessage, [前置-最新1.10]ProtocolLib, [前置]PlaceholderAPI-2.10.2, [前置]ProtocolLib-4.4.0, [前置]Vault-1.7.1, [基础]EssentialsX-2.15.0.60, [基础]EssentialsXChat-2.15.0.60, [基础]EssentialsXProtect-2.15.0.60, [基础]EssentialsXSpawn-2.15.0.60, [基础}权限组]EssentialsXGroupManager, [多世界]Multiverse-Core-4.1.0, [屏蔽报错]ConsoleSpamFix-1.8.2, [快捷商店]QuickShop-2.3.1, [拔刀剑]slashfortifier, [权限]LuckPerms-Bukkit-4.4.1, [登录]AuthMe-5.6.0, [禁用物品]??BanItem-1.1-SORA, [经济]iConomy-7.0.6, [菜单]DeluxeMenus-1.13.1-Release, [锁]Modern-LWC-1.9.6, [领地]Residence4.9.0.5, [领地修复]CatResidenceAssist, pTweaks [v6.0.16-b13]

replies.author: HYFan_Meng
replies.txt_content:
猜不透的伪装 发表于 2020-4-26 23:44
#CommandsItem, AutosmeltFix, ColorMOTD-Reremake, CrowdLocator, MyItems_V4.9, PlaceholderAPI-2.10.5 ...
崩溃记录呢[logs,crash]

replies.author: a1294790523
replies.txt_content:
没猜错的话应该是某个插件在OP进入服务器时进行网络操作检查更新导致的
建议安装Yum并使用网络控制功能禁止访问：https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=701333
